verses.verse: Then <WG5119> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Was Led Up <WG321> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Wilderness <WG2048> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> To Be Tempted <WG3985> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Devil. <WG1228>
And <WG2532> Having Fasted <WG3522> Days <WG2250> Forty <WG5062> And <WG2532> Nights <WG3571> Forty, <WG5062> Afterwards <WG5305> He Hungered. <WG3983>

And <WG2532> Having Come <WG4334> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Tempter <WG3985> Said, <WG2036> If <WG1487> Son <WG5207> Thou Art <WG1488> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Speak <WG2036> That <WG2443> <WG3588> <WG3037> These Stones <WG3778> Loaves <WG740> May Become. <WG1096>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Answering <WG611> Said, <WG2036> It Has Been Written, <WG1125> Not <WG3756> ' By <WG1909> Bread <WG740> Alone <WG3441> Shall Live <WG2198> Man, <WG444> ' But <WG235> By <WG1909> Every <WG3956> Word <WG4487> Going Out <WG1607> Through <WG1223> The Mouth <WG4750> Of God. <WG2316>

Then <WG5119> Takes <WG3880> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Devil <WG1228> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Holy <WG40> City, <WG4172> And <WG2532> Sets <WG2476> Him <WG846> Upon <WG1909> The <WG3588> Edge <WG4419> Of The <WG3588> Temple, <WG2411>

And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> If <WG1487> Son <WG5207> Thou Art <WG1488> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Cast <WG906> Thyself <WG4572> Down : <WG2736> <WG1125> <WG1063> For It Has Been Written, <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG32> To His Angels <WG846> He Will Give Charge <WG1781> Concerning <WG4012> Thee, <WG4675> And <WG2532> In <WG1909> Their Hands <WG5495> Shall They Bear <WG142> Thee, <WG4571> Lest <WG3379> Thou Strike <WG4350> Against <WG4314> A Stone <WG3037> <WG3588> <WG4228> Thy Foot. <WG4675>
Said <WG5346> To Him <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Again <WG3825> It Has Been Written, <WG1125> Thou <WG3756> Shalt Not Tempt <WG1598> The Lord <WG2962> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Thy. <WG4675>

Again <WG3825> Takes <WG3880> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Devil <WG1228> To <WG1519> A Mountain <WG3735> High <WG5308> Exceedingly, <WG3029> And <WG2532> Shows <WG1166> To Him <WG846> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Kingdoms <WG932> Of The <WG3588> World <WG2889> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG1391> Their Glory, <WG846>
And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> These Things <WG5023> All <WG3956> To Thee <WG4671> Will I Give <WG1325> If <WG1437> Falling Down <WG4098> Thou Wilt Worship <WG4352> Me. <WG3427>

Then <WG5119> Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Get Thee Away, <WG5217> Satan; <WG4567> <WG1125>, For It Has Been Written, <WG1063> The Lord <WG2962> <WG3588> <WG2316> Thy God <WG4675> Shalt Thou Worship, <WG4352> And <WG2532> Him <WG846> Alone <WG3441> Shalt Thou Serve. <WG3000>
Then <WG5119> Leaves <WG863> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Devil, <WG1228> And <WG2532>, Behold, <WG2400> Angels <WG32> Came <WG4334> And <WG2532> Ministered <WG1247> To Him. <WG846>
<WG191> But Having Heard <WG1161> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> That <WG3754> John <WG2491> Was Delivered Up, <WG3860> He Withdrew <WG402> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Galilee : <WG1056>

And <WG2532> Having Left <WG2641> <WG3588> Nazareth, <WG3478> Having Come <WG2064> He Dwelt <WG2730> At <WG1519> Capernaum, <WG2584> Which <WG3588> Is On The Seaside, <WG3864> In The <WG1722> Borders <WG3725> Of Zebulun <WG2194> And <WG2532> Naphtali, <WG3508>
That <WG2443> Might Be Fulfilled <WG4137> That Which <WG3588> Was Spoken <WG4483> By <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> The <WG3588> Prophet, <WG4396> Saying, <WG3004>

Land <WG1093> N-VSF Of Zebulun 2194 N-PRI And 2532 CONJ Land 1093 N-NSF 1093 N-VSF, Of Naphtali, 3508 N-PRI Way 3598 N-ASF Of The Sea, 2281 N-GSF Beyond 4008 ADV The 3588 T-GSM Jordan, 2446 N-GSM Galilee 1056 N-NSF 1056 N-VSF Of The 3588 T-GPN Nations, 1484 N-GPN

The <WG3588> People <WG2992> Which <WG3588> Was Sitting <WG2521> In <WG1722> Darkness <WG4655> Has Seen <WG1492> A Light <WG5457> Great, <WG3173> And <WG2532> To Those Which <WG3588> Were Sitting <WG2521> In The <WG1722> Country <WG5561> And <WG2532> Shadow <WG4639> Of Death, <WG2288> Light <WG5457> Has Sprung Up <WG393> To Them. <WG846>

From <WG575> That Time <WG5119> Began <WG756> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> To Proclaim <WG2784> And <WG2532> To Say, <WG3004> Repent; <WG3340> <WG1448> For Has Drawn Near <WG1063> The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> Of The <WG3588> Heavens. <WG3772>

<WG4043> And Walking <WG1161> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> By <WG3844> The <WG3588> Sea <WG2281> <WG3588> Of Galilee <WG1056> He Saw <WG1492> Two <WG1417>, Brothers, <WG80> Simon <WG4613> Who <WG3588> Is Called <WG3004> Peter, <WG4074> And <WG2532> Andrew <WG406> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother, <WG846> Casting <WG906> A Large Net <WG293> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Sea, <WG2281> <WG2258> For They Were <WG1063> Fishers : <WG231>
And <WG2532> He Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Come <WG1205> After <WG3694> Me, <WG3450> And <WG2532> I Will Make <WG4160> You <WG5209> Fishers <WG231> Of Men. <WG444>
<WG3588> And They <WG1161> Immediately <WG2112> Having Left <WG863> The <WG3588> Nets, <WG1350> Followed <WG190> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Having Gone On <WG4260> Thence, <WG1564> He Saw <WG1492> Other <WG243> Two <WG1417>, Brothers, <WG80> James <WG2385> The Son <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Zebedee, <WG2199> And <WG2532> John <WG2491> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother, <WG846> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Ship <WG4143> With <WG3326> Zebedee <WG2199> <WG3588> <WG3962> Their Father, <WG846> Mending <WG2675> <WG3588> Nets <WG1350> Their, <WG846> And <WG2532> He Called <WG2564> Them; <WG846>
<WG3588> And They <WG1161> Immediately <WG2112> Having Left <WG863> The <WG3588> Ship <WG4143> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3962> Their Father <WG846> Followed <WG190> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Went About <WG4013> All <WG3650> <WG3588> Galilee <WG1056> <WG3588>, Jesus, <WG2424> Teaching <WG1321> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4864> Their Synagogues, <WG846> And <WG2532> Proclaiming <WG2784> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Of The <WG3588> Kingdom, <WG932> And <WG2532> Healing <WG2323> Every <WG3956> Disease <WG3554> And <WG2532> Every <WG3956> Bodily Weakness <WG3119> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> People. <WG2992>

And <WG2532> Went Out <WG565> The <WG3588> Fame <WG189> Of Him <WG846> Into <WG1519> All <WG3650> <WG3588> Syria. <WG4947> And <WG2532> They Brought <WG4374> To Him <WG846> All <WG3956> <WG3588> <WG2560> Who Were Ill, <WG2192> By Various <WG4164> Diseases <WG3554> And <WG2532> Torments <WG931> Oppressed, <WG4912> And <WG2532> Possessed By Demons, <WG1139> And <WG2532> Lunatics, <WG4583> And <WG2532>, Paralytics; <WG3885> And <WG2532> He Healed <WG2323> Them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Followed <WG190> Him <WG846> Crowds <WG3793> Great <WG4183> From <WG575> <WG3588> Galilee <WG1056> And <WG2532> Decapolis <WG1179> And <WG2532> Jerusalem <WG2414> And <WG2532> Judea <WG2449> And <WG2532> Beyond <WG4008> The <WG3588> Jordan. <WG2446>
